html: To those who perpetrate, peddle or tolerate hate: people of good will in this country won’t back down in the face of your violence. We won’t be afraid. Your disgraceful acts compel us to stand up, to embolden our efforts to right the course of history. And we will prevail.

html: “I know you lived,” @RepGutierrez says at #CHCI gala, choking back tears. “We recognize your humanity. We recognize your humanity even if the president of the United States refuses to do so. You all had children and we miss you. We miss you very much.” Absolutely heartbreaking.
text:
“I know you lived,” @RepGutierrez says at #CHCI gala, choking back tears.

“We recognize your humanity. We recognize your humanity even if the president of the United States refuses to do so. You all had children and we miss you. We miss you very much.”

Absolutely heartbreaking.
